about_the_game:
The girls and girls' clothes are contaminated with pixelation, and the player will control the eraser to remove these clothes and pixelated parts.
The eraser can move up and down, left and right, but the eraser can only move in one direction at a time until it hits the wall.
Every path the eraser takes removes the girls' clothes and excess pixelation. The player needs to do some thinking to make sure that every pixelation is cleared, and in the end win and get the pictures of the girls.
Players can also double check the pixelated state of the girls and the state of no clothes in the Atlas function.

content_descriptors.notes:
The player will take on the role of a righteous eraser, removing the clothes of the girl subjected to evil pixelation
The world is constantly pixelated by corruption
Pixelated clothes will become evil and make people no longer happy
The great players will resist to the end, destroy all the pixelated clothes, and share the joy for all

detailed_description:
The girls and girls' clothes are contaminated with pixelation, and the player will control the eraser to remove these clothes and pixelated parts.
The eraser can move up and down, left and right, but the eraser can only move in one direction at a time until it hits the wall.
Every path the eraser takes removes the girls' clothes and excess pixelation. The player needs to do some thinking to make sure that every pixelation is cleared, and in the end win and get the pictures of the girls.
Players can also double check the pixelated state of the girls and the state of no clothes in the Atlas function.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.13
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4600 (AMD or NVIDIA equivalent)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Pixelate Must Die

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The girl's clothes were contaminated with pixelation. The player will take on the role of a righteous eraser, removing the clothes of the girl affected by the evil pixelation, and saving the world from pixelation.
